Html: Chirpy's cool but when I search for stuff in my JS and CSS files I get a bunch of duplicates from the combined and minified versions. Has anyone figured out how to exclude these from showing up when using Find in Visual Studio?

I've check out the same inconvenience.

Even more, because css/js files encoded in single line VS search shows content of all found files.

I use file patterns i.e. "*.cs;*.debug.js;*.chirp.less.css" but it is not very handy...
